Jamie Benn

Full Name: Jamie Benn

(Bennie)

Position: LW •  Shoots: Left

6-3, 206lb (190cm, 93kg)

Team: Dallas Stars

Born: July 18, 1989 in Victoria, British Columbia ca

Draft: Dallas, 5th round (129th overall), 2007 NHL Entry

Amateur Teams: Kelowna Rockets

Pronunciation: \JAY-mee BEHN\

Relatives: Brother Jordie Benn

Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Jamie Benn?

Jamie Benn is 35 years old.

When was Jamie Benn born?

Jamie Benn was born on July 18, 1989.

Where was Jamie Benn born?

Jamie Benn was born in Victoria, Canada.

How tall is Jamie Benn?

Jamie Benn is 6-3 (190 cm) tall.

How much does Jamie Benn weigh?

Jamie Benn weighs 206 lbs (93 kg).

How many goals does Jamie Benn have?

Jamie Benn had 16 goals last season and 399 goals over his career.

How many points does Jamie Benn have?

Jamie Benn had 49 points last season and 956 points over his career.

How many Stanley Cups has Jamie Benn won?

Jamie Benn has never won a Stanley Cup as a player.
